users.name: Miranda Pablo Agustin
users.description: Amante de Magic: The Gathering, siempre en busca de nuevos mazos y estrategias. Mi color favorito de maná es [Inserta tu color aquí] y disfruto jugando con [tu tipo de mazo o comandante favorito]. ¡Vamos a jugar y compartir ideas sobre este increíble juego!

cards.name: Murktide Regent
cards.oracle_text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Flying
This creature enters with a +1/+1 counter on it for each instant and sorcery card exiled with it.
Whenever an instant or sorcery card leaves your graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

decks.name: Agropinking
decks.description: Deck totalmente agro preparado para derrotar a mis oponentes lo mas rapido posible, obteniendo la victoria inmediata

cards.name: Abdel Adrian, Gorion's Ward
cards.oracle_text:
When Abdel Adrian enters, exile any number of other nonland permanents you control until Abdel Adrian leaves the battlefield. Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token for each permanent exiled this way.
Choose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)
cards.set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

cards.name: Abhorrent Oculus
cards.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile six cards from your graveyard.
Flying
At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, manifest dread. (Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature and the other into your graveyard. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)

cards.name: Adventuring Gear
cards.oracle_text:
Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, equipped creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
cards.flavor_text: An explorer's essentials in a wild world.

cards.name: Aether Searcher
cards.oracle_text:
Reveal this card as you draft it. Reveal the next card you draft and note its name.
When this creature enters, you may search your hand and/or library for a card with a name noted as you drafted cards named Aether Searcher. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. If you searched your library this way, shuffle.

decks.name: RedHoyo
decks.description: Deck Centrado en cartas rojas tipo dragon, con el objetivo que cuando el contrincante pierda los experimente de forma carnal.

cards.name: Broodmate Dragon
cards.oracle_text:
Flying
When this creature enters, create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying.
cards.flavor_text: Frozen in fear, the goblins stared upward at the circling hunter—and were promptly eaten by its diving mate.

cards.name: Death by Dragons
cards.oracle_text: Each player other than target player creates a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying.

cards.name: Covetous Dragon
cards.oracle_text:
Flying
When you control no artifacts, sacrifice this creature.
cards.flavor_text: Gatha survived as long as he did by giving all Keld's predators exactly what they wanted.

cards.name: Dragonborn Champion
cards.oracle_text:
Trample
Whenever a source you control deals 5 or more damage to a player, draw a card.
cards.flavor_text: "I was raised on stories of my ancestors, and I want to write my own pages in the tales."

cards.name: Dragon Grip
cards.oracle_text:
Ferocious — If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, you may cast this spell as though it had flash. (You may cast it any time you could cast an instant.)
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has first strike.

cards.name: Dragon Cultist
cards.oracle_text: Commander creatures you own have "At the beginning of your end step, if a source you controlled dealt 5 or more damage this turn, create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying."
cards.set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
cards.flavor_text: You know that mighty dracoliches will one day rule over this world. For you, that day can't come soon enough.

cards.name: Dragonkin Berserker
cards.oracle_text:
First strike
Boast abilities you activate cost {1} less to activate for each Dragon you control.
Boast — {4}{R}: Create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying. (Activate only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)

cards.name: Kargan Dragonrider
cards.oracle_text: As long as you control a Dragon, this creature has flying.
cards.flavor_text: "Only those who give the dragons the respect they deserve may bear our title."

cards.name: Hypersonic Dragon
cards.oracle_text:
Flying, haste
You may cast sorcery spells as though they had flash. (You may cast them any time you could cast an instant.)
cards.flavor_text:
"Even this primitive specimen of my kind is impressive."
—Niv-Mizzet

cards.name: Mirrorwing Dragon
cards.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell that targets only this creature, that player copies that spell for each other creature they control that the spell could target. Each copy targets a different one of those creatures.
